snippet: The significance of Monteverdi’s 1610 Vespers was not lost in the Green Mountain Project’s Wednesday performance of the work at the Church of St. Mary the Virgin.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews concert of works by Monteverdi performed by early-music group Green Mountain Project at Church of St Mary the Virgin.
lead_paragraph: The significance of Monteverdi’s 1610 Vespers was not lost in the Green Mountain Project’s Wednesday performance of the work at the Church of St. Mary the Virgin.

headline.seo: Monteverdi’s 1610 Vespers at the Church of St. Mary the Virgin
headline.main: Celebrating Monteverdi’s Vespers With Attention to 400-Year-old Details
headline.print_headline: Celebrating Monteverdi’s Vespers With Attention to 400-Year-old Details
